Welcome to GrassApp

Baltimore's first community-focused cannabis delivery platform, bringing quality products directly to your door.

🎯

Our Mission

To provide safe, reliable, and convenient access to medical cannabis while fostering community growth and economic opportunities.

✨

What We Offer

  • 🔒Fast, discreet delivery
  • 🌿Quality-verified products
  • 💳Secure transactions
  • 🤝Community support
💚

Our Values

  • 🤝Community First
  • 🔒Safety & Security
  • 📈Local Growth

Getting Your Card

  • 1️⃣Register with MMCC
  • 2️⃣Get certified by a doctor
  • 3️⃣Receive your card
  • 4️⃣Start ordering!
